attributes.action: Ban Josie Cunningham from using the NHS to become famous
attributes.additional_details:
Josie Cunningham abused the NHS to get a breast enlargement in an attempt to become famous.
She is now stating that she will use the NHS again to get botox and other surgeries which she doesn't need.
There are plenty of people in the UK today who need a real operation on the NHS but either can not or are on a waiting list.
We want the Government to ban Josie Cunningham and other people from abusing the system to try and become famous.
Josie Cunningham should be forced to pay every penny back to the NHS for her breast enlargement as well as any others who have done it for the same reason.

In her bid to become famous she is willing to have an abortion to get on Big Brother.
